articles.title: Ukraine's Volodymyr Zelensky to meet South Africa's Cyril Ramaphosa to counter Russia - BBC
articles.description: Volodymyr Zelensky is on a historic visit to South Africa to counter Russia's influence on the continent.
articles.content:
Ukraine's President Volodymyr Zelensky is on a historic visit to South Africa, signalling a dramatic improvement in the once-strained relations between the two nations. 
The visit marks a diplomatic… [+5725 chars]
